title: Workers Leaving the Factory
creator_credit: Heinrich Mis, Christian Baute, Harun Farocki and Harun Farocki Filmproduktion
brief_description: In this documentary essay based on the Lumière brothers groundbreaking film, Harun Farocki uses to provide an insight into the changes both in work and film through motion pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

creator_credit_for_label: Heinrich Mis, Christian Baute, Harun Farocki and Harun Farocki Filmproduktion
description: Based on the first film recording – workers leaving the Lumière factory – Farocki provides an insight in the changes into both the phenomenon of work and film through pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.
description_for_label: Based on the first film recording – workers leaving the Lumière factory – Farocki provides an insight in the changes into both the phenomenon of work and film through pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.
